Info.Author: Nelson Mandela
Info.Content: It always seems impossible until its done.

Info.Author: Elon Musk
Info.Content: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

Info.Author: Arthur Ashe
Info.Content: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can..

Info.Author: Aristotle
Info.Content: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

Info.Author: John Burroughs
Info.Content: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.

Info.Author: Walt Disney
Info.Content: If you can dream it, you can do it.

Info.Author: Confucius
Info.Content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

Info.Author: Samuel Beckett
Info.Content: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.

Info.Author: Robert Frost
Info.Content: In three words I can sum up everything I have learned about life -- it goes on.

Info.Author: Mark Twain
Info.Content: If you tell the truth, you do not have to remember anything.

Info.Author: Oscar Wilde
Info.Content: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

Info.Author: Jean De la Fontaine
Info.Content: Man is so made that whenever anything fires his soul, impossibilities vanish.

Info.Author: Horace
Info.Content: Do not think, just do.

Info.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Info.Content: Failure is success if we learn from it.

Info.Author: Thomas Edison
Info.Content: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.

Info.Author: Robin Williams
Info.Content: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.

Info.Author: Abraham Lincoln
Info.Content: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.

Info.Author: Marcus Aurelius
Info.Content: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts- therefore, guard accordingly, and take care that you entertain no notions unsuitable to virtue and reasonable nature.

Info.Author: Marcus Aurelius
Info.Content: Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.

Info.Author: Marcus Aurelius
Info.Content: How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it.

Info.Author: Marcus Aurelius
Info.Content: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

Info.Author: Marcus Aurelius
Info.Content: If it is not right do not do it; if it is not true do not say it.

Info.Author: Stephen King
Info.Content: The scariest moment is always just before you start. After that, things can only get better.

Info.Author: Nelson Mandela
Info.Content: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

Info.Author: William Lloyd Garrison
Info.Content: Are right and wrong convertible terms, dependant upon popular opinion?

Info.Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Info.Content: I would define, in brief, the poetry of words as the rhythmical creation of Beauty.

Info.Author: Maori Proverb
Info.Content: Turn your face toward the sun and the shadows will fall behind you.

Info.Author: Eric Thomas
Info.Content: When you want to succeed, as badly as you want to be successful, that is when you will be successful.

Info.Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Info.Content: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.

Info.Author: J. Michael Straczynski
Info.Content: No greater love hath a man than he lay down his life for his brother. Not for millions, not for glory, not for fame. For one person, in the dark where no one will ever know or see.
